law.catch_line: Civil action for violation of KRS 359.020 or 359.030.
law.text: Any person injured by the violation of any of the provisions of KRS 359.020 or 359.030 may bring an action against the person who or corporation that committed the violation, to recover all damages sustained by reason of the violation, whether the person or corporation committing the violation has been convicted or not.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4775.
